MCQ: What is the scientific study of life known as?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Mitosis | d: Genetics

MCQ: What allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Energy processing | b: Cell division | c: Respiration | d: Digestion

MCQ: Which level of organization in biology involves the anatomy and physiology of plants and animals?
Choices: a: Molecular biology | b: Cell biology | c: Organismal biology | d: Population biology

MCQ: When did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 1.5 billion years ago | b: 3.7 billion years ago | c: 5 billion years ago | d: 10 million years ago
